faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Still confused or hesitant? Here are answers to the most frequently asked questions by potential StreamHib users

items.question: Do I need to install software or applications?
items.answer: No need to install anything! StreamHib is web-based, can be opened from phone or laptop. Just open browser, login to dashboard, and you can control live streaming from anywhere.

items.question: What if my home internet dies?
items.answer: Relax! Live streaming runs on our server, not on your device. So even if your internet dies, live streaming continues normally. You only need internet to access the control dashboard.

items.question: Can I set automatic live schedule?
items.answer: Absolutely! Just set the time in dashboard, then our system automatically starts/stops live according to schedule. You can set daily, weekly, or custom schedule as needed.

items.question: Can videos be looped continuously?
items.answer: Of course! You upload 1 video, it will keep playing while live is active. Perfect for content like relaxing music, ASMR, rain sounds, or other ambient videos.

items.question: How's the streaming quality? Can it be HD?
items.answer: Our server supports streaming up to 1080p 60fps with stable bitrate. Quality will automatically adjust to viewer's connection for the best experience.

items.question: Is there a live duration limit?
items.answer: No limit! You can live 24/7 as long as subscription is active. Our server is designed specifically for long-term live streaming without interruption.

items.question: How to upload videos?
items.answer: Super easy! Login to dashboard, click 'Upload Video', select file from your device, wait for upload process to complete, then video is ready for streaming.

items.question: Can I stream to multiple platforms simultaneously?
items.answer: Yes! You can stream simultaneously to YouTube, Facebook, Twitch, and other platforms from one dashboard. This feature is available in Pro and Business packages.

items.question: If there's a problem, how's the support?
items.answer: We provide email support for all packages, priority support for Pro package, and 24/7 phone support for Business package. Our support team is ready to help anytime.

items.question: Are my data and videos safe?
items.answer: Definitely safe! We use SSL encryption, automatic backup, and servers that meet international security standards. Your videos and data are well protected.
